turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about a very important situation that involves you. It's urgent we resolve this now before anything serious happens. Can you hear me clearly?

Oh hello there, I'm sorry but I don't quite remember who this is. Could you tell me your name and how I know you? And what exactly is this important matter about?
Is it something to do with my taxes or finances maybe? I've been a bit worried about that lately.
Can you hold on for just one second while I ask my wife if she knows who you are too?

Sure, no problem. It's me, your grandson! We've talked before but maybe it's been a while since we last spoke. Look, Grandpa, there's been an issue with the IRS regarding some unpaid taxes from back in 2019. They're saying if this isn't resolved right away, they'll show up at your door within the hour to take you into custody for not paying them.
I really need you to stay on the line so we can figure out how to fix this today before it gets any worse. We should have sent a letter or given you a call earlier but things got hectic here and now there's a real risk of immediate consequences if anything isn't done quickly.
How do you feel about that? Are you able to handle this right now, Grandpa?

Wait just a moment please while I talk with my wife. She'll know what we should do next.
(Hangs up briefly)
My wife says she hasn't heard from any official government entity regarding unpaid taxes or anything like that. We're pretty careful about these kinds of issues and try to handle them promptly. But if you say it's really urgent, maybe I need to speak with someone at the IRS myself directly, not just over this phone call.
Could you provide me a number for an actual office of the Internal Revenue Service so I can confirm all this information? This seems very serious and I want to make sure we deal with it properly.
Also, my wife mentioned that our accountant usually handles these matters. Maybe we should contact him instead since he's more familiar with our financial situation.
Can you give me a moment to do that while you hold or shall we hang up now?
